attributes.action: Do not allow pro EU politicians involvement in the UK's leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details: As noted  in the pro EU referendum campaign.
attributes.background: It's not practical to allow politicians who personally promoted the EU to influence Britain leaving the EU. This conflicts directly with the idea of a British democratic  decision. If we are to take back Britain it needs to be pro British  politicians speaking for us. Pro Britain not pro EU.
